entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
AREAS OF FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
